name: Pet Shop Pandemonium
description:
Local-multiplayer mayhem! Small business simulation! Domesticated animal adoption brawler!

Deliver as many pets as possible in one minute to become employee of the month!

A game for two human players by Alexander King.

CONTROLS

PLAYER 1: WASD to move, L CTRL for action!

PLAYER2: ⍐⍇⍗⍈ to move, R CTRL for action!

ACTION: Pick up cage. Throw cage. Deliver pet to customer.

PETS

Puppers: Chase players. Barking slows you down.

Cats: Lay wherever they please, get in the way.

Birds: Fly around, are the worst pet.
